tweets.name: Michael Saylor
tweets.text: Bitcoin is the perfect asset for the digital age. The convergence of institutional adoption and store of value narrative continues to strengthen.

tweets.text: TRON is now the fastest growing blockchain. DePIN is the next big thing!
